tagline: Automated ML lifecycle management — reproducible training, safe deployment, continuous monitoring
pros: Full ML lifecycle automation: experiment tracking through retraining triggers
Drift detection and monitoring that catches silent model degradation
Reproducible pipelines: same code + same data = same model, every time
Cost-aware — tracks and optimizes GPU compute, storage, and API spend
cons: Doesn't develop models or do data science — builds the infrastructure around them
ML platform setup has significant upfront investment before payoff
Needs buy-in from data scientists to adopt standardized workflows

model_recommendations.notes: Complex reasoning, architecture, security, or financial analysis. Needs the best available model with full thinking/reasoning enabled.
